ingredients.name: Salt, pepper, curry, sugar, cinnamon, olive oil, sunflower oil, garlic, onion, vinegar

instructions: In a pot, add the rice, water, butter, and a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until the water is absorbed.
Transfer the cooked rice to a baking dish and spread it evenly.
Top with sliced strawberries and lemon slices.
Sprinkle the salt, pepper, curry, sugar, cinnamon, olive oil, sunflower oil, garlic, onion, and vinegar over the top.
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly on top.
